plot: Melinda deals with a ghost who believes an email caused her death and her mother's coma and is intent on spreading the misery.

Ned's dorm girl friend Brianna freaks when she finds her room ransacked. They consult Melinda on the theory it relates to a spooky chain letter, allegedly sent by her late roommate Gwen Collier, who died in a car accident which left her mother Paula comatose to date. Aiden's empathic powers are showing, as he senses every mail to Melinda even before she reads it. The team resolves to prove the ghost's belief in the 'Sally Stitch' chain-letter misplaced to make her stop punishing people who fail to send it on.—KGF Vissers
